sentences.en: Fishing has been a profitable industry lately.
sentences.cn: 捕鱼近来成了一项赚钱的行当.

sentences.en: He failed in a profitable venture.
sentences.cn: 他的一项赚钱的冒险事业失败了。

sentences.en: Insurance is one of Britain's most profitable invisible exports.
sentences.cn: 保险业是英国获益最大的无形出口之一.

sentences.en: It is profitable to farm shellfish.
It was profitable for them to produce large amounts of food.
sentences.cn: 生产大量的食物能让他们获利。

sentences.en: That business became profitable last year.
sentences.cn: 那项生意去年变得很赚钱.

sentences.en: The advertising campaign proved very profitable.
sentences.cn: 事实证明，这次广告宣传活动卓有成效。

sentences.en: The bottom line is that it's not profitable.
sentences.cn: 最重要的一点是它无利可图。

sentences.en: The convention business is very profitable for the hotel industry.
sentences.cn: 承办会议业务能给旅馆业带来很高的利润.

sentences.en: The service of the Lord had been more profitable.
sentences.cn: 为上帝效劳就有利多了.

sentences.en: They found it profitable to exchange and compare ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们发现交流思想、互相比较有好处.

sentences.en: This is less profitable and less dignified.
sentences.cn: 这更没出息,挣不到几文钱.

sentences.en: Those oil shares were a good investment, ie have been profitable.
sentences.cn: 那些石油股票是有利可图的投资.

sentences.en: Tina believed that, given time, her business would become profitable.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜相信假以时日，她的生意一定会盈利。

words.tran_cn: 赢利能力；收益性；利益率
有利益的,有用的,有帮助的

trans.tran_cn: 有利可图的，有益的，可赚钱的，合算的
trans.tran_en: producing a profit or a useful result
